teamMembers.name: Alice Johnson
teamMembers.bio: Alice has over 15 years of experience in software development and architecture. She leads our technical strategy and ensures we're always at the cutting edge of technology.

teamMembers.name: Bob Smith
teamMembers.bio: Bob is passionate about creating intuitive and beautiful user interfaces. With a background in both design and psychology, he brings a unique perspective to our products.

teamMembers.name: Carol Martinez
teamMembers.bio: Carol is a full stack wizard with expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies. She's always excited to tackle complex problems and mentor junior developers.
